content: add these adorable mini hats to your christmas décor for a little festive flair it can be cute christmas tree ornaments or accessories for toys this crochet pattern includes detailed instructions pictures and links for video tutorials it s a great project for crochet beginners the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology size of the finished hat about 2 76 inches 7 cm long with semicotton yarn and a 3 mm crochet hook you can use the same pattern to make larger or smaller toys by using finer or bulkier yarn pick a crochet hook at least a size smaller than suggested on yarn label and crochet tightly enough to achieve a tight gauge that will not allow the stuffing to show through the fabric ⚡️difficulty easy only basic crocheting skills will be needed to make this pattern chain single_crochet increasing and decreasing this pattern is for personal use only you do not have permission to recopy rewrite or redistribute this pattern in any form as your own or otherwise you may not resell my patterns but you are welcome to sell any of the items made from my patterns
